item.title: Lab 0
item.description: A first lab playing with points and vectors.

item.title: Points & Vectors
item.description: 3Demos is a visualization tool developed for presentations in this class. Here, we use it to explore some basic properties of points, vectors, and vector operations. Goals Visualize various linear combinations of vectors. Explore and utilize some dynamic features. Save a scene in. Linear Combinations Navigate to https://3demos.ctl.columbia.edu/. Click on Objects → Add Object → Vector Repeat once. Our scene now has 2 vectors with random components. We will refer to them as and , respectively.
